data.message:
How do you get in touch with a Facebook administrator as I am getting a little bit annoyed with reporting fake accounts and they are being allowed to continue to operate.
You guys need for us to be able to report a fake account for review together with additional materiel so we can show the pictures are not used by the rightful owner.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing this, Jesper. If someone created an account pretending to be someone you know, we recommend reporting it as an impostor account by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2xGkpjj . -Kiara

It is not someone i know - but i get a lot of attention from accounts that are easily identified as being fake. I ALWAYS check pictures using google search - and many times the pictures comes up for being model photos of internation models. There are no places to report this.
